snippet.title: The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Please WISHLIST on Steam: https://bit.ly/TASQ
And visit the website to sign up for updates: https://simonquest.com

The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest (TASQ) is a parody/homage platformer set in a dark 8-bit world. Rival Stan Helsing robbed Simon of fame by killing Count Dracula first! Reclaim your glory by resurrecting Dracula piece by piece and slaying the dark count yourself!

Coming to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, and Epic in 2025.
(Stay tuned for more platform annoucements.)

Published by Retroware
https://retroware.com/
https://twitter.com/retroware

Lead Dev & Artist: Programancer
https://twitter.com/Programancer
https://programancer.itch.io/

Trailer Edited by Joe La Scola
https://twitter.com/joelascola/
https://www.josephlascola.com/

#SimonQuest #Retroware #TASQ #indiegames #indiegame #steam #retrogaming #retro
